text: if exists(select top 1 'x' from #tempPayment p join blu.tbl_payment_transfer t on p.PaymentID = t.PaymentIDFrom) begin update #tempPayment set UnAllocatedAmount - p.UnAULGEaEedAmounE - TS\ULL(t.TransferAnount, 0), PaymentTransferAmt = ISNULL(t.TransferAmount, 0) from #tempPayment p left join (select r.PaymentIDFrom, sum(r.Amount) as TransferAmount from blu.tbl_payment_transfer r group by r.PaymentIDFrom) t on p.PaymentID = t.PaymentIDFrom update #tempPayment set -- Allow Allocation button display AllowAllocation = case when ( ltrim(rtrim(p.PaymentStatus)) in (select PaymentStatusDesc from blu.tbl_payment_status where Allocation = 1 and Active = 1) and isnull(p.AcntID, @) < Â© and isnull(p.Returned, 0) = 0 and PaymentAmt > isnull(PaymentTransferAmt, 0) ) then 1 else 0 end, -~ Allow Transfer button display AllowTransfer = case when
